scripts.build-all: (cd .. && npm run gen-docs) && npm run build
scripts.gen-api-docs-en: (cd _api && sh copy_api.sh)  && rm -rf _api/en && mkdir -p _api/en && cp ../tsconfig.json _api/en/ && patch -p0 < _api/ja/typedoc-add-no-inherit.diff && typedoc --options ./_api/typedoc.en.js --params --generate-json ./_api/en _api/tmp/**/*.ts
scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud app deploy _site/app.yaml --project polymer-lit-element --no-promote
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run build && gcloud app deploy _site/app.yaml --project polymer-lit-element-staging
